data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in East Kameng, Arunachal Pradesh, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of East Kameng, Arunachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the county of East Kameng.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 76,879, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in East Kameng, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Saloi people. Make the Saloi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, help every believer in East Kameng, Arunachal Pradesh, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 77,834 lost in East Kameng that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.section_summary:
the county of East Kameng, Arunachal Pradesh, India has a population of 78,700.

We estimate East Kameng has 866 people who might know Jesus, 955 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 76,879 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in East Kameng, Arunachal Pradesh, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

location.name: East Kameng
